For <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had shut him <S%H3607>up<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Wherefore dost thou <S%H5012>prophesy<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H5414>Behold<s%>, I will give this <S%H5892>city<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and he shall take <S%H3920>it<s%>;

and <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall not <S%H4422>escape<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, but shall <S%H5414>surely<s%> be <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> with him <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>;

and he shall <S%H3212>bring<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and there shall he be until I <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H5002>him<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: though ye <S%H3898>fight<s%> with the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, ye shall not <S%H6743>prosper<s%>?
And <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Behold <S%H2601><s%>, Hanamel the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> thine <S%H1730>uncle<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H559>thee<s%>, saying, <S%H7069>Buy<s%> thee my <S%H7704>field<s%> that is in <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%>; for the <S%H4941>right<s%> of <S%H1353>redemption<s%> is thine to buy <S%H7069>it<s%>.

So <S%H2601>Hanamel<s%> mine <S%H1730>uncle<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to me in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>guard<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7069>me<s%>, Buy my <S%H7704>field<s%>, I pray <S%H6068>thee<s%>, that is in Anathoth, which is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>; for the <S%H4941>right<s%> of <S%H3425>inheritance<s%> is <S%H1353>thine<s%>, and the redemption is <S%H7069>thine<s%>; buy it for <S%H3045>thyself<s%>. Then I knew that this was the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And I <S%H7069>bought<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> that was in <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%> of <S%H2601>Hanamel<s%> mine <S%H1730>uncle<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H8254>weighed<s%> him the <S%H3701>money<s%>, even <S%H7651>seventeen<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.

And I <S%H3789>subscribed<s%> the <S%H5612>deed<s%>, and <S%H2856>sealed<s%> <S%H5749>it<s%>, and called <S%H5707>witnesses<s%>, and <S%H8254>weighed<s%> him the <S%H3701>money<s%> in the <S%H3976>balances<s%>.

So I <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5612>deed<s%> of the <S%H4736>purchase<s%>, both that which was <S%H2856>sealed<s%>, according to the <S%H4687>law<s%> and <S%H2706>custom<s%>, and that which was <S%H1540>open<s%>:

and I <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H5612>deed<s%> of the <S%H4736>purchase<s%> unto <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5374>Neriah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4271>Mahseiah<s%>, in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of <S%H2601>Hanamel<s%> mine <S%H1730>uncle<s%>'s <S%H5869>son<s%>, and in the presence of the <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> that <S%H3789>subscribed<s%> the <S%H5612>deed<s%> of the <S%H4736>purchase<s%>, <S%H5869>before<s%> all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>guard<s%>.
And I <S%H6680>charged<s%> <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> <S%H5869>before<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, saying,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H3947>Take<s%> these <S%H5612>deeds<s%>, this <S%H5612>deed<s%> of the <S%H4736>purchase<s%> which is <S%H2856>sealed<s%>, and this <S%H5612>deed<s%> which is <S%H1540>open<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> them in an <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%>; that they may <S%H5975>continue<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H1004>Houses<s%> and <S%H7704>fields<s%> and <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> shall yet <S%H7069>again<s%> be bought in this <S%H776>land<s%>.

Now <S%H310>after<s%> I had <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H5612>deed<s%> of the <S%H4736>purchase<s%> unto <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5374>Neriah<s%>, I <S%H6419>prayed<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Ah <S%H162><s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>! <S%H6213>behold<s%>, thou hast made the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> by thy <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> and by thine <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>; there is <S%H1697>nothing<s%> too hard for <S%H6381>thee<s%>,

who <S%H6213>showest<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> unto <S%H505>thousands<s%>, and <S%H7999>recompensest<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> into the <S%H2436>bosom<s%> of their <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1419>them<s%>; the great, the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name<s%>;

great <S%H1419><s%> in <S%H6098>counsel<s%>, and <S%H7227>mighty<s%> in <S%H5950>work<s%>; whose <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H6491>open<s%> upon all the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> according to his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and according to the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of his <S%H4611>doings<s%>:

who didst <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> and <S%H4159>wonders<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, even unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, both in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and among other <S%H120>men<s%>; and <S%H6213>madest<s%> thee a <S%H8034>name<s%>, as at this <S%H3117>day<s%>;

and didst bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with <S%H226>signs<s%>, and with <S%H4159>wonders<s%>, and with a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and with an outstretched <S%H248>arm<s%>, and with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4172>terror<s%>;

and <S%H5414>gavest<s%> them this <S%H776>land<s%>, which thou didst <S%H7650>swear<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H776>them<s%>, a land <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>;

and they came <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> <S%H8085>it<s%>, but they obeyed not thy <S%H6963>voice<s%>, neither <S%H1980>walked<s%> in thy <S%H8451>law<s%>; they have <S%H6213>done<s%> nothing of all that thou <S%H6680>commandedst<s%> them to <S%H6213>do<s%>: therefore thou hast caused all this <S%H7451>evil<s%> to come upon <S%H7122>them<s%>.

Behold <S%H5550><s%>, the mounds, they are <S%H935>come<s%> unto the <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H3920>take<s%> <S%H5892>it<s%>; and the city is <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> that <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H6440>it<s%>, because of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and of the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and of the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>; and what thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> is come to <S%H7200>pass<s%>; and, behold, thou seest it.

And thou hast <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H136>me<s%>, O Lord <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H7069>Buy<s%> thee the <S%H7704>field<s%> for <S%H3701>money<s%>, and <S%H5749>call<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%>; whereas the <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>.
Then came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Behold <S%H3068><s%>, I am Jehovah, the <S%H430>God<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>: is there <S%H1697>anything<s%> too hard for <S%H6381>me<s%>?

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H5414>Behold<s%>, I will give this <S%H5892>city<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and he shall take <S%H3920>it<s%>:

and the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, that <S%H3898>fight<s%> against this <S%H5892>city<s%>, shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H3341>set<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%> on <S%H784>fire<s%>, and <S%H8313>burn<s%> <S%H1004>it<s%>, with the houses, upon whose <S%H1406>roofs<s%> they have offered <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, and poured <S%H5258>out<s%> <S%H5262>drink-offerings<s%> unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%>.

For the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> have <S%H6213>done<s%> only that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight<s%> from their <S%H5271>youth<s%>; for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have only provoked me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with the <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

For this <S%H5892>city<s%> hath been to me a provocation of mine <S%H639>anger<s%> and of my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that they <S%H1129>built<s%> it even unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>; that I should <S%H5493>remove<s%> it from before my <S%H6440>face<s%>,

because of all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, which they have <S%H6213>done<s%> to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%>, <S%H4428>they<s%>, their kings, their <S%H8269>princes<s%>, their <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and their <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And they have <S%H6437>turned<s%> unto me the <S%H6203>back<s%>, and not the <S%H6440>face<s%>: and though I <S%H3925>taught<s%> <S%H7925>them<s%>, rising up early and <S%H3925>teaching<s%> <S%H8085>them<s%>, yet they have not hearkened to <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%>.
But they <S%H7760>set<s%> their <S%H8251>abominations<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> which is <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%>, to defile <S%H2930>it<s%>.

And they <S%H1129>built<s%> the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, which are in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom<s%>, to cause their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the fire unto <S%H4432>Molech<s%>; which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them <S%H5927>not<s%>, neither came it into my <S%H3820>mind<s%>, that they should <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H8441>abomination<s%>, to cause <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to <S%H2398>sin<s%>.

And now therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, concerning this <S%H5892>city<s%>, whereof ye <S%H559>say<s%>, It is <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and by the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and by the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>:

Behold <S%H6908><s%>, I will gather them out of all the <S%H776>countries<s%>, whither I have <S%H5080>driven<s%> them in mine <S%H639>anger<s%>, and in my <S%H2534>wrath<s%>, and in <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7110>indignation<s%>; and I will bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> unto this <S%H4725>place<s%>, and I will cause them to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%>:
and they shall be my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and I will be their <S%H430>God<s%>:

and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, that they may <S%H3372>fear<s%> me for <S%H3117>ever<s%>, for the <S%H2896>good<s%> of <S%H1121>them<s%>, and of their children after <S%H310>them<s%>:

and I will <S%H3772>make<s%> an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H7725>them<s%>, that I will not turn away from following <S%H310>them<s%>, to do them <S%H3190>good<s%>; and I will <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H3374>fear<s%> in their <S%H3824>hearts<s%>, that they may not depart from <S%H5493>me<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: Like as I have <S%H935>brought<s%> all this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon this <S%H5971>people<s%>, so will I <S%H935>bring<s%> upon them all the <S%H2896>good<s%> that I have promised <S%H1696>them<s%>.
